name: Cultural Property
description: Join the crew of the NX-01 Enterprise on an archaeological expedition into the Neutral Zone, where there may be evidence of a lost Vulcan-Human settlement. Or is it Romulan-Vulcan? Guarantee first rights via a friendly combat exercise!
rules:
-- In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of T'Pol, Phlox, Tucker, Humanoid Figure, Enterprise characters, or crew with matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
-- Using the NX-01 Enterprise, D'deridex Warbird, or Suurok Class ship will provide a bonus to hull.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: T'Pol, Phlox, Tucker, Enterprise characters, or Humanoid Figure

featured_crew.name: Travers
featured_crew.flavor: A member of the resistance in New York. Alicia helps Archer liberate her city and restore the 20th century timeline.

featured_crew.name: Phlox
featured_crew.flavor: Even Phlox has to engage in regular EV suit training.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Persis
rewards.flavor: A human augment, Persis developed a strong attachment to Arik Soong, who she viewed as her father.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

next_threshold_rewards.name: Credits
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

screens.text: "Here's a new one for you AND the Neutral Zone, Captain: care to engage in a friendly combat exercise with the Romulans?"
"Our reward will be well worth the effort. I was intrigued enough by it to join my colleagues here, though archaeology is certainly not my primary field."

"Given that the temporal anomaly crisis began with a decided unfriendly confrontation between yourself and the Romulans, engaging in this exercise might help to repair relations with the Empire. Another reward, so to speak."
